title: Question About the new Arcade Skins
body: Will they be limited availability or available forever? I'm genuinely curious so I know if I have a deadline before they're removed.

replies.body: Will Arcade Miss Fortune come on sale soon? October, perhaps? It's been quite a while now since that skin was released.
well u could just go and buy the bundle lol
I already have DJ Sona, so I don't want Arcade Sona. Being in a bundle shouldn't affect its chances of going on sale.

true. it doesn't affect the chances at all :O Void Fizz was in a bundle and he's gonna be on sale in September nevertheless. Sadly Arcade MF isn't gonna be on sale next month, but maybe in October. If you love the skin tho, just get it for the full price (or get the sona one as well while ur at it.) I have DJ sona myself and the bundle costs 675rp for me, cuz I'm only missing Sona~ But I'm not gonna buy it cuz DJ Sona is kinda the same only better xD
October would be nice. I already have Mafia Miss Fortune, so I'm in no rush to get another MF skin, but I do like Arcade MIss Fortune. October or November would be okay with me.
They're not legacy, so they won't be going away anytime soon. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hxRU7PHR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-20T20:17:12.027+0000)
>
> They're not legacy, so they won't be going away anytime soon. :]

Great news! Thanks, Katey :)
I believe that might they stay there forever it just on sale till the 8/24, but we could a have rioter answer this it would be better to clear things up.
